snippet: Jean-Bertrand Aristide was placed on house arrest in a corruption investigation, an order protested by his supporters whom claimed there was no provision in Haitian law for such a penalty.
abstract: Former Haitian Pres Jean-Bertrand Aristide is ordered by court not to leave his home as part of corruption investigation.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Bertrand Aristide was placed on house arrest in a corruption investigation, an order protested by his supporters whom claimed there was no provision in Haitian law for such a penalty.

headline.main: Ex-President of Haiti Put Under House Arrest
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Haiti Put Under House Arrest
